title: Pus Vomit - Degrade The Worthless  mp3   Metal    2009
description:
Pus Vomit - Degrade The Worthless  mp3   2009 What we got Brutal Slammin Death Metal.... The first thing I noticed about this release is the sinister air of iniquity and vile sense of ugliness that it conveys. Now, whether it was intentional or not, the artworkÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s color scheme (or lack there of) hints that there is something very different about it compared to the many modern death metal albums currently saturating the scene. Put it in a row with any five brutal death metal CDs that you have which were released in the same number of recent years and Degrade The Worthless, the debut album from Pus Vomit (Philippines) sticks out just like a dead finger nail.

Speaking of dead, there are no less than four tracks here with a title containing that particular word. In fact, all song titles look as if they were pulled out of some serial killerÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s personal journal containing writings about the gruesome acts he plans to do or had already done to his victims. Herein lies words that are perverse, straight to the point, and strangely enough, all too personal. It all seems so real.                                          1. 	She Died a Virgin 	03:06 	 
2. 	Soaked in Her Own Blood 	02:46 	 
3. 	God Help Me Rape the Dead 	02:15 	 
4. 	Pungent Rotting Flesh 	02:28 	 
5. 	Self Inflicted Wound 	03:17 	 
6. 	Dead for Rent 	02:58 	 
7. 	Your Dead Body I Molest 	03:22 	 
8. 	Dead Remains 	02:24 	 
9. 	Retching Lacerated Entrails 	03:11 	 
10. 	Dismembered Virgin Limbs 	04:13 	 
  	30:00 	                                                     Ryan 	Drums

Marco 	Vocals                                                    ................Seed if ya can these torrents dont live for long I wish it were different..........
